response.original_title: 嵐の夜に大嫌いな担任教師とまさかの校内2人きり帰宅難民… 濡れ透け女子生徒は担任オヤジのキモいセクハラ愛撫に感じてしまいそのまま朝までハメられイカされまくった 児玉れな
response.overview: 'Rena', who belongs to the track and field club, hated the advisor teacher who has a power harassment temperament and gives guidance at the last minute of sexual harassment. One day, despite the heavy rain from the evening, the teacher ordered her to stay. She and her advisor's teacher are unable to return due to the storm. The body of Rena who got wet with heavy rain can see through her underwear through her uniform, and finally receives a sexual line that crosses the line from the devil teacher who was lustful for it. Rena is the humiliation of a perverted middle-aged teacher who lasts all night ...
response.title: Stuck At School Overnight With The Teacher I Hate Because Of A Storm… It's Just The Two Of Us And My Clothes Are Soaked – The Gross Old Perv Can See Everything – But There Was Nowhere Else To Go, So He Wound Up Fucking Me Until I Came Rena Kodama
